item.source: Monster drops d claws and ::yell to every one code, whats wrong?

item.title: Monster drops d claws and ::yell to every one code, whats wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

If you wanna make it drop d claws then go to config -> npcdrops.cfg
Add this in there:

npcdrop = 50	8002	1	10

Then just use this:

if (npcs.npcType == 50) { temp.yell("Some one killed the kbd and got claws!");

If you’re using delta then this should work.
Hope this helped

Read full topic
